PKCS#11   

PKCS#11 bridge allows PKCS#11 module library applications to use the certificates on the ID card. The bridge supports user identification in the Firefox web browser and ID card certificate use in the Thunderbird e-mail program on all platforms.

Functionality:

 1. User identification (entering e-services) in  the Firefox browser. To authenticate the user has to enter PIN1.
 1. Signing and encrypting e-mail sin Thunderbird - the user can digitally sign and encrypt and decrypt e-mail with ID-card certificates using his e-mail client.
 1. Ending the session when the card is removed
 1. Logging into the Linux operating system using the card
